tool_description: Query for quote data, market movers, international markets,  sector performance, orders, chart, and news
name: Fidelity Investments
title: Fidelity Investments

api_list.name: auto-complete (Deprecated)
api_list.description:
Auto suggestion by input name or quote.
* This endpoint is deprecated

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: Symbol or company name

api_list.name: quotes/get-chart (Deprecated)

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description: Separated by comma for multiple symbols, support up to 3 symbols at a time

required_parameters.name: endDate
required_parameters.description: Date format must be strictly follow yyyy/MM/dd-HH:mm:ss

required_parameters.name: startDate
required_parameters.description: Date format must be strictly follow yyyy/MM/dd-HH:mm:ss

optional_parameters.name: granularity
optional_parameters.description: From 1 to 6, use with intraday to specify day or month

api_list.name: news/list-top (Deprecated)
api_list.description: List top news from all supported area

optional_parameters.name: symbol
optional_parameters.description: The symbol of quote, market, etc..., such as : IMRN. Only one is allowed at a time

api_list.name: news/v2/get-details

required_parameters.name: storyId
required_parameters.description: The value of resId field returned in .../news/list-by-symbol endpoint

api_list.name: market/get-international (Deprecated)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fidelity-investments.p.rapidapi.com/market/get-international"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fidelity-investments.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: v3/auto-complete (Deprecated)
api_list.description: Auto suggestion by input name or quote

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.description: Symbol or company name

api_list.name: symbols/get-events
api_list.description: Get events related to a specific venue xid

required_parameters.name: venueXid
required_parameters.description: The value of venue field returned in .../symbols/get-xids endpoint

optional_parameters.name: endDate
optional_parameters.description:
To filter data in data range, the date format must be yyyy-MM-dd
Ex : 2023/12/25

optional_parameters.name: startDate
optional_parameters.description:
To filter data in data range, the date format must be yyyy-MM-dd
Ex : 2023/12/25

api_list.name: symbols/get-xids

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description: The value of symbol field returned in .../v4/auto-complete endpoint

api_list.name: symbols/get-profile

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description: The value of symbol field returned in .../v4/auto-complete endpoint

api_list.name: symbols/get-company-profile

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description: The value of symbol field returned in .../v4/auto-complete endpoint

api_list.name: symbols/get-historical-chart

required_parameters.name: symbols
required_parameters.description: The value of symbol field returned in .../v4/auto-complete endpoint. Separate by comma for multiple symbols. Ex : FBTC,AAPL,...

optional_parameters.name: startDate
optional_parameters.description:
To filter data in date range, the date format must be yyyy/MM/dd-HH:mm:ss
Ex : 2023/12/25-13:00:00

optional_parameters.name: endDate
optional_parameters.description:
To filter date in data range, the date format must be yyyy/MM/dd-HH:mm:ss
Ex : 2023/12/25-13:00:00

api_list.name: symbols/get-top-holdings

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description: The value of symbol field returned in .../v4/auto-complete endpoint

api_list.name: news/list-by-symbol

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description: The value of symbol field returned in .../v4/auto-complete endpoint

optional_parameters.name: endDate
optional_parameters.description:
List news before this point of time. The date format must be yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss
Ex : 2024-01-25T12:12:12

optional_parameters.name: count
optional_parameters.description: Limit number of items per response. Maximum is 50

api_list.name: symbols/get-company-logo

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description: The value of symbol field returned in .../v4/auto-complete endpoint

optional_parameters.name: scale
optional_parameters.description: String format must match IntegerxInteger. Ex : 150x150

api_list.name: symbols/get-quote

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description: The value of symbol field returned in .../v4/auto-complete endpoint

api_list.name: v4/auto-complete
api_list.description: Get suggestions by term or phrase

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.description: Symbol or company name

api_list.name: v2/auto-complete (Deprecated)
api_list.description: Auto suggestion by input name or quote

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.description: Symbol or company name

api_list.name: news/get-details (Deprecated)

required_parameters.name: resId
required_parameters.description: The value of resId field returned in .../news/list-top endpoint, such as : 202003011902RTRSNEWSCOMBINED_KBN20O2GM-OUSBS_1

api_list.name: quotes/get-details (Deprecated)

required_parameters.name: symbols
required_parameters.description: Separated by comma to query multiple symbols

api_list.name: quotes/get-mashup (Deprecated)
api_list.description: Get additional information for specific quote, market

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description: Only one symbol is allowed
